§ 47510. Tradeoff allowance Notwithstanding another law or a regulation prescribed or order issued under that law, the tradeoff provisions contained in appendix C of part 36 of title 14, Code of Federal Regulations, apply in deciding whether an aircraft complies with subpart I of part 91 of title 14. (Added Pub. L. 103–429, § 6(72)(A), Oct. 31, 1994, 108 Stat. 4387.)
Historical and Revision Notes
RevisedSectionSource (U.S. Code)Source (Statutes at Large)
4751049 App.:2125.Feb. 18, 1980, Pub. L. 96–193, § 305, 94 Stat. 57.
The word “prescribed” is added for consistency in the revised title and with other titles of the United States Code. The words “subpart I of part 91” are substituted for “subpart E of part 91” because of the restatement of part 91. See 54 Fed. Reg. 34321 (Aug. 18, 1989).
